column1: Local Foods////I cannot say enough about Local Foods. I've been a couple of times
column2: and each time I thoroughly enjoy everything I order and have always had a very pleasant experience. For people unfamiliar with this semi-chain
column3: they have a few locations across Houston
column4: and each offers a unique menu. There are overlaps with regards to sides and a few entree items
column6: there is a lot of variance among restaurants. In any case
column7: I think the site in Rice Village is the best both in terms of ambiance and offerings.
